news.title: The Outer Worlds 2 Hotfix 1.0.4.1 Patch Notes
news.author: Obsidian Aarik
news.contents: Greetings Commanders! We are releasing hotfix 1.0.4.1 for The Outer Worlds 2. As always, we are very appreciative for your continued support and patience.If you come across any other issues, please contact us via our Issue Tracker page. The Earth Directorate thanks you.Critical FixesFixing saves crashing on load 100% of the time if bad data gets into the favorited item data.Fixed several rare crashes.(PS5 only) Fixed crash when game was started with only PlayGo chunk installed, and user progressed past Horizon point station.Plug Puller Perk no longer prevents encounters from advancing.Players will no longer have their conversation history reset at unexpected times during gameplay.Cleared out portions of the map will no longer be reset.Quests/Progression: (Contains Spoilers)Players who encountered problems with Inez after meeting her at the Ministry of Accuracy should be able to progress her argument with Milverstreet now, even if they could not before.Inez will now reliably play her in...

news.title: The Outer Worlds 2 Is Out Now
news.author: Obsidian Aarik
news.contents: You’ve trained for this. You’ve read the briefings. You’ve probably ignored most of them. Now it’s time to find out what kind of Earth Directorate agent you really are.The Outer Worlds 2 has officially launched, and the rift-torn colony of Arcadia needs… well, someone. Navigate a world caught between military order, religious prophecy, and corporate branding—and decide which of them deserves your loyalty, your skepticism, or your best sarcastic remark.Your decisions shape everything. Will you follow protocol, break it, or accidentally vaporize it? Forge alliances, betray them, or try to talk your way out of the mess you just created. Every choice carries weight—some of it explosive.Players who grab the Premium Edition can dive even deeper with The Moon Man’s Corporate Appreciation Prize Pack, access to digital artbook and soundtrack, and a DLC Pass for two future story expansions. Because no matter what kind of agent you turn out to be, you might as well look good doing it.So go on—rep...

news.title: The Outer Worlds 2 pre-launch hotfix makes you less likely to fall through the world or have to fight a closet
news.contents: The Outer Worlds 2 arrives in full today, October 29th. Ahead of the gates to Arcadia finally being flung open to those who didn't fancy paying extra for early access, Obsidian have taken a stab at fixing some key issues and pesky bugs which've reared their heads so far. Good news, unless your roleplaying was set to be contingent upon being swallowed up by the ground or having to try and beat up an angry cupboard at some point in the space adventure. Read more

news.title: The Outer Worlds 2 Hotfix 1.0.4.0 Patch Notes
news.author: Obsidian Aarik
news.contents: Hello Commanders, we are releasing Hotfix 1.0.4.0 for The Outer Worlds 2. We’d like to take this time to thank you all for support, patience, and for your consumerism. Below are the latest fixes:If you come across any issues, please visit our Issue Tracker and contact us there. Community Reported Issues:Critical Fixes:Premium Edition owners on the PlayStation 5 are correctly granted the Corporate Appreciation Prize Pack & (if you own a pre-order version of the game) the Commander Zane’s Battle Pack.Note: Unfortunately, the Consumerism Flaw being rewarded is not fixed in this patch and will be addressed in a future hotfix. Permanent fade to black when returning to the Praetor landing pad no longer occurs.Saving and Loading while using the dematerializer will no longer prevent the player from equipping weapons.Inez is no longer absent sometimes from Fairfield after she returns there from the Ministry of Accuracy.Note: This fix only applies to new saves. We sincerely apologize for those s...

news.title: So, it turns out The Outer Worlds 2 spent 95% of its runtime mocking me for a purchase I didn't make
news.contents: My review of The Outer Worlds 2 begins with a retelling of the first unexpected curveball the RPG threw my way. Barely out of the intro and having made exactly two vending machine purchases, I was offered the consumerism flaw. This puzzled me. As it turns out, this event had good reason to puzzle me. Read more

store.name: Apex Legends™
store.short_description: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.
store.detailed_description:
Apex Legends: Amped



About the Game

Conquer with character in Apex Legends, a free-to-play* Hero shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame & fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

Master an ever-growing roster of diverse Legends, deep-tactical squad play, and bold, new innovations that go beyond the Battle Royale experience — all within a rugged world where anything goes. Welcome to the next evolution of Hero Shooter.

KEY FEATURES


This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.

Note that any unused Apex Coins will expire 180 days after the first date in which they are acquired or purchased. The oldest Apex Coins that are subject to expiration in your balance will always be used first when using them to make in-game purchases.

Apex Packs purchase is not available in Belgium.

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 27.0.2
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Heads up, legends. We made the following changes: Map Fixes:World's Edge:Fixed a blue lighting tint issueFixed an issue where certain window bars could be bypassed by crouchingBroken Moon:Restored several missing ziplines across the map Audio & UI:Adjusted Rampart Package and Mythic Bin map icons to be more visible for the Supersonic Event Misc:Fixed server crashes when opening packs + entering a matchCorrected a Superglide bug that will now allow you to Mantle Boost over obstacles while crouched

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 11/26/25
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Update: This should now be resolved and players should be able to connect as normal.Hey legends, Due to an Epic Online Services outage, PC players are currently unable to access servers. We are hoping to see the issue resolved ASAP and will keep everyone posted on the updates.

news.title: Apex Legends™: Matchmaking Test Update
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Welcome back to the latest Apex Legends Matchmaking dev update! Grab a comfy chair, your favourite warm beverage, and settle in for our latest update.In this blog, we’re going to cover:A refresher of key matchmaking conceptsTest Results: 26.1 Ranked matchmaking testMatchmaking health motivated Duos changesThings you can do to (possibly) improve your matchmaking experienceWhat is next for matchmakingMatchmaking Key Concepts RefresherIf you have been keeping up on our Matchmaking Blogs (links here), then you can probably skip this section, or use it as a refresher and read on.Apex Legends’ matchmaking systems try to balance two main criteria for an optimal player experience: filling a lobby with similarly skilled players and doing so within a certain amount of time. It can only fill a lobby from the pool of available players currently online, who are actively seeking a match, on a specific platform (unless you have crossplay enabled), in a specific region.The system has parameters for ea...

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 11/24/25
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Hey legends, We have heard, loud and clear, the community feedback and frustration with Wildcard's Birds of Prey R-99. As a result we are removing the EMP effect for the remainder of the event in an effort to reduce its power. We will continue to monitor the situation, thank you for your patience!

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 11/20/2025 - 4:15pm PDT
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Heads up, legends: We've temporarily disabled one of the sound effects associated with the Bird of Prey R-99 found in Rampart Care Packages in Wildcard. You will no longer hear the beeping noise associated with its missiles while we work on adjusting it to be less intrusive.

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 11/20/2025
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: We have pushed a couple quick fixes we wanted to communicate:Octane challenge "Travel 250 meters with Octane's Stim" should now progress appropriately for those with the Octane Spotlight PassVoid Disruption Evolved R-301 reload speed is now in line with all other R-301 skins

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 11/18/25
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: We have pushed a quick fix for a couple issues:Mad Maggie's Ult will now destroy doors as intendedPlayers will see the appropriate visual effects when knocking an enemy using the R-99, R-301 and Flatline.

news.title: [AMA] Let’s get into new Olympus!
news.author: respawn_bean
news.contents: Hey Legends! Hopefully you’ve had a chance to experience our changes and overhauled version of Olympus. We’ll be answering as many Olympus questions as possible this Wednesday, November 19, 2025, at 10 am PT. Drop your questions here ahead of our AMA and tune back for replies when we go live. As always, feedback is also welcome and we’ll be collecting everything to share with the team. Here’s our Olympus team on deck:Michael, Sr. Level DesignerJason, Associate Art DirectorJaclyn, Sr. Game WriterReminder: Please keep your questions focused on Olympus and the lore around the new Olympus changes. Please limit comments to 1-2 related questions - you can always send more replies! If you’ve got off topic questions, let us know which AMA we should host next.Chat soon!

news.title: Supersonic Event Gameplay Trailer
news.author: Electronic Arts
news.contents: Olympus drops into Wildcard, a new missile-launching Mythic R-99 hits the field, and speed-boosting Wild Cards help you outrun and outplay your opponents.Apex Legends™ on Steam

news.title: Apex Legends: Latest Update 11/12/2025
news.author: RSPN_karlee
news.contents: We've sent out a fix for the "Bird of Prey" R-99 Skin reloading faster than intended. Thanks for your patience as we worked out that bug!

store.name: RV There Yet?
store.short_description: A co-op adventure about driving your Recreational Vehicle home.
store.detailed_description:
DRIVE HOME

You and your buddies are on your way home from a relaxing vacation but are forced to take an alternate route. Get your RV through the back country and find the exit to Route 65.

SURVIVE MABUTTS VALLEY

Not everyone who enters Mabutts Valley makes it out alive. So be sure to keep a steady flow of burgers, antidotes, and the classic: EpiPens.

WINCH IT GOOD

Master the physics based winch and earn the right to be the main remote commander. With a winch front and rear, your RV is especially equipped to get over, under or through most road bumps.

HELP YOURSELF, AND EACH OTHER

Help yourself to cold brewskis and filtered low tar cigarettes, but don’t forget that the driver will have a hard time completing this journey alone.

A SCRAPPY BUNCH

Use everything you find to maintain the integrity of your RV and friendships.

Features:

  • Drive one RV together with up to 4 players

  • Winch

  • One map

  • Proximity Chat

  • Online co-op

  • Hats

  • Grill frozen meat patties

  • Smoke Cigarettes

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14756 (20/11/2025)
news.author: mackyman
news.contents: Todays patch is mostly debug logs for more information so that we can try to narrow down why some of you can't play multiplayer, but some gameplay fixes too.Bugs:- Fix spelling errors in vehicle HUD - Fix bug where you couldn't drag a smoke on gamepad - Remove vehicle debug window from public builds- Fix bug where item/player held by disconnecting player was stuck in the air.- Potential bug fix for RV going haywire for one person when someone sits down in a seat Tweaks: - Added debug logs to help us figure out why some people are getting infinite spinners during joining game- Added debug logs to help us figure out why some people can’t create games- Updated error message on why you can’t create game to better help people understand them Features: - Added information in main menu about your connection status to the steam relay network

news.contents: * ARC Raiders; * Battlefield™ 6; * Europa Universalis V; * Dispatch; * Steam Deck; * Kingdom Come: Deliverance II; * Football Manager 26; * EA SPORTS FC™ 26; * RV There Yet?; * INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road; * excluding free to play games View top 100 on SteamDB

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14520 (06/11/2025)
news.author: mackyman
news.contents: Patch: 1.0.14520 (06/11/2025)The highlight of todays patch is keybindings for keyboard and mouse (gamepad is yet to come). We also fixed some issues with saves and focused abit on error messages and feedback.Bugs:- Fixed bug where VOIP was stuck in toggle when switching to Push To Talk until the button was pressed- Fixed bug where a save file could be corrupted and stuck in infinite restarts by triggering a save when RV was destroyed- Fixed bug where you could end up with a save file where all players online in the session are dead- Fixed bug where welder can be stuck in hand and still welding when it hit max limit Balancing:- Nerfed bear spawning a bit. But bears are still bears so watch out Tweaks: - Updated vehicle input hints to match the style and placement used throughout the rest of the game. - Added popup with errors when failing to create a game- Added so that in coming versions, the game will tell you if it's outdated if your steam clients knows about another patch- Updated h...

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14460 (31/10/2025)
news.author: K2
news.contents: A softlock bug was introduced with the first patch today and we wanted to resolve that before the weekend. Bugs:Fix softlock bug that occurred when the game was saved with the welder in hand, preventing the player from picking up any items.

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14455 (31/10/2025)
news.author: K2
news.contents: Bugs:Fix bug where welder was still active in hands when it’s force dropped

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14453 (31/10/2025)
news.author: mackyman
news.contents: The highlight of todays patch is two crash fixes, but there is some general bug-fixes in there tooBugs:- Fixed wrong material on gas station.- Fixed a bug where the handbrake remained engaged when exiting a vehicle without releasing it, forcing the next driver to release it before driving - Fixed bug where items fell through the carpet in front of the driver's seat due to missing collision- When attaching winch hook back to winch we reset it like the prompt says - Fix crash FWasapiDeviceEnumeration::EnumerateDefaults crash that happens when players try to enter the map without a microphone connected Tweaks: - Added missing (Light Flare) prompt on flares with correct keybind.- Welding machine now a have max cable length Features: - Moose can now be cooked - Added option to disable scene captures (mirrors). Temporary fix to allow some specific cards to run the game (mostly low end). If you are running an intel integrated card this will be enabled by default. Can be turned off in settings...

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14373 (27/10/2025)
news.author: K2
news.contents: Small patch to fix Swedish language bug- Remove Swedish Language Bug

news.title: Patch: 1.0.14370 (27/10/2025)
news.author: mackyman
news.contents: Today we have a smaller patch trying to solve some of the more glaring gameplay issues with the RV and a few small fixes with options.Bugs:- Fix invert look does not work when driving - Fix RV disassembles into pieces when driver disconnects- Potential fix for RV going crazy and flying away or bugging out physics wise- Add missing RT/LT gamepad icons in interaction text- Add missing water volume- Fixed DLSS setting to properly work in conjunction with AA Features: - Added VSync options

store.name: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS
store.short_description: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS, the high-stakes winner-take-all shooter that started the Battle Royale craze, is free-to-play! Drop into diverse maps, loot unique weapons and supplies, and survive in an ever-shrinking zone where every turn could be your last.
store.detailed_description:
LAND 

 

Drop into an ever-growing and changing selection of maps to keep you challenged. Will you choose the safer outskirts and risk not getting enough loot or hot drop into the dense cities and fight from the moment you hit the ground? Every drop is different, it's up to you to make the best with what you find. 

LOOT 

 

With unique weapons, a variety of supplies, and special tools to outwit your opponents, how you outfit yourself is up to you! Kit out your favorite weapons with powerful attachments or risk going after the hotly contested Care Packages for unique loot to give you the edge you need to win. 

SURVIVE 

 

Stocking up is only the beginning. With the Safe Zone growing ever smaller as time goes on, your risk of running into other survivors dramatically increases. Die and you're out. You'll need to outthink, outrun, or outshoot your opponents if you're to be the last one standing and claim ultimate victory.  

MANY WAYS TO PLAY, 

 

Warm up in Team Deathmatch, try out constantly changing modes in the Arcade, drop into the latest seasonal event, or build your own custom lobby and challenge your friends to something unique. 

EVERY MATCH IS UNIQUE 

 

No two battles are the same, and everything hinges on the choices you make to land, loot and survive. Drop into the Battlegrounds where victory hinges on every move and every choice, and fight to be the last one standing. 

Optional in-game purchases available.

This dedication to craftsmanship, where every detail pursues perfection, elevates Porsche beyond a mere vehicle, transforming it into a moving piece of art. Discover the Panamera Turbo S, which sets the standard for luxury sedans with its innovative performance and unparalleled comfort; the 911 Carrera GTS, the quintessential sports car that combines thrilling performance with everyday practicality; and the Cayenne Turbo GT, where SUV versatility meets racing DNA for unmatched power. store.name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
store.short_description: Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or multiplayer modes.
store.detailed_description:
EDITIONS BREAKDOWN


About the Game

Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or multiplayer modes.

Fight the enemies of Mankind as Lieutenant Demetrian Titus in this sequel to 2011’s Space Marine, and prove your loyalty once again as you are reinstated to the Ultramarines. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets and uncover dark secrets to drive back the everlasting night.

Dive into a war of galactic proportions! Enjoy intense, gory and fast-paced third-person action with hundreds of enemies on screen, and purge the relentless Tyranid swarms made possible by Saber’s trademark Swarm Engine.

Jump in endlessly brutal and replayable PvE and PvP modes as your own Space Marines, unlocking new skills and cosmetics the more you play! Fight as one of six unique classes, unlock up to 25 perks for each class, add perks to each of your weapons, and customise your appearance with a huge array of armour and weapon cosmetics!

Tear through unending waves of Tyranid and Chaos assaults and fight to survive as long as you can in the unforgiving 3-player Siege mode. Accumulate points with each wave you defeat to spend on ammunition, equipment charges, Medicae Stimms and more… or use them to summon reinforcements like Cadians, Space Marines or the mighty Dreadnought.

Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or multiplayer modes.

Fight the enemies of Mankind as Lieutenant Demetrian Titus in this sequel to 2011’s Space Marine, and prove your loyalty once again as you are reinstated to the Ultramarines. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets and uncover dark secrets to drive back the everlasting night.

Dive into a war of galactic proportions! Enjoy intense, gory and fast-paced third-person action with hundreds of enemies on screen, and purge the relentless Tyranid swarms made possible by Saber’s trademark Swarm Engine.

Jump in endlessly brutal and replayable PvE and PvP modes as your own Space Marines, unlocking new skills and cosmetics the more you play! Fight as one of six unique classes, unlock up to 25 perks for each class, add perks to each of your weapons, and customise your appearance with a huge array of armour and weapon cosmetics!

Tear through unending waves of Tyranid and Chaos assaults and fight to survive as long as you can in the unforgiving 3-player Siege mode. Accumulate points with each wave you defeat to spend on ammunition, equipment charges, Medicae Stimms and more… or use them to summon reinforcements like Cadians, Space Marines or the mighty Dreadnought.

news.title: Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2's new Techmarine class can turn the environment to their advantage
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: Saber Interactive has an early holiday treat for us, courtesy of a first proper look at the Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 Techmarine. The new class is scheduled to arrive early in 2026, further bolstering the roster of one of the best Warhammer 40k games on the market. As the highly trained technicians of the Space Marines, they're an ideal option if you like to supplement your own battle proficiency with tools and support weapons. They also sit at the perfect intersection of all my years spent playing Engineer in TF2 and my affinity for the Adeptus Mechanicus. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2's Reclamation update finally gives Chaos the respect it deserves The biggest Warhammer 40k game ever just got a free demo, and it's 55% off if you like what you see Space Marine 2 developer already knows you'll hate the new Blood Angels skin

news.title: November Community Update
news.author: Hylia
news.contents: Greetings Space Marines 👋The end of the year is near, so let us spoil you with some Patch 12 spoilers and then, let’s rewind on what happened lately on Space Marine 2!A LITTLE TEASER NEVER KILLED NOBODY…We’re heading towards the end of the year, which means we’re getting closer to the addition of the Techmarine! It’s time for us to start sharing a bit of what we’ve been cooking for this new class: First, the Techmarine comes with its iconic new weapon: the Omnissian Axe. As every new melee weapon, this halberd style weapon comes with its own set of unique animations, finishers and progression.The Techmarine has a Servo-Gun ability, activating it will enable the gun to automatically engage enemies. In addition to that, the Techmarine has a passive ability to restore Tarantula Sentry Guns that can spawn on existing PvE levels. Lastly, you might wonder which Traitor Legion the Chaos Techmarine will be associated with in PvP. We cannot spoil too much right now, but we’ll make sure to give ...

news.title: The Reclamation Update is live!
news.author: elodie.mombelli
news.contents: Hi Space Marines! Today’s Reclamation Update brings a new PvE mission for the Operations and Stratagems modes, a load of free cosmetic rewards, and two new DLCs for Season Pass 2 holders.Check out our Reclamation Update Trailer!New threats and challenges await 🌟​The Reclamation Update brings new content for all players such as gameplay improvements, new Operation, cosmetics, weapons and more!Check out the highlights below, and be sure to explore the full patch notes for all the details.The Reclamation Update includes:The new “Reclamation” Operation, taking you aboard the derelict Wrath of Espandor and featuring the menacing Tyranid Prime6 Hero weapon variants to earn through Accolades, including Bolt Sniper Rifle, Heavy Bolter, Instigator Bolt Carbine, Heavy Bolt Pistol, Power Fist, and Thunder Hammer8 new armour pieces: 4 helmets and 4 pauldrons, all redeemable with AccoladesNew Battlefield Conditions in Stratagems mode, adding fresh twists and challenges to PvE gameplayFull Modular C...

news.title: Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2's Reclamation update finally gives Chaos the respect it deserves
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: I can't remember the last time I checked out a Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 update and it wasn't incredibly exciting. After revealing a whole roadmap (including finally announcing Iron Hands cosmetics for us Medusan sickos) last time around, developer Saber Interactive isn't showing any signs of stopping. It seems like it's on a one-studio mission to top our list of the best Warhammer 40k games ever made. And if anything can help it to ascend that contested leaderboard, it's making a pact with the Chaos Gods. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: The biggest Warhammer 40k game ever just got a free demo, and it's 55% off if you like what you see Space Marine 2 developer already knows you'll hate the new Blood Angels skin Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2 update fixes friendly fire and nerfs sniper cloak

news.title: Patch Notes 11.0
news.author: mzulftna
news.contents: Hello Space Marines!The 11.0 patch is now live on every platform. Read the complete patch notes down below.Features that have changed since the PTS’ Patch Notes are flagged with this icon: 🟡 New PvE map: ReclamationOperation Reclamation takes place in orbit above the planet Avarax.A squad of Space Marines is deployed to a critically damaged Imperial cruiser to purge it of Tyranid infestation. However, as the mission unfolds, the objectives begin to shift.New PvE Equipment: Sanctified WrathUpon use, the player's melee damage is increased by 25% for 15 seconds, and the player is immune to knockbacks. When used, enemies within a small radius are pushed back.🟡 Change from PTS: Increased amount of charges from 1 to 2💬 It's not the last equipment that we are going to add.New Battlefield ConditionsMore than 40 new Battlefield Conditions have been added.New Heroic ItemsAdded 6 Heroic Weapons and 8 Armour Pieces to unlock with Accolades. Weapons:Retribution's Bequest (Heavy Bolt Pistol)Chains o...

news.title: Steam Awards 2025
news.author: Hylia
news.contents: Greetings Space Marines,  We’re thrilled to announce that Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is in the running for the "Labor of Love” category at this year’s Steam Awards! Over the past months, we’ve poured our hearts into refining and expanding the experience, bringing new content and enhancements based on your feedback. If Space Marine 2 has been your go-to shooter that keeps you coming back, show your unwavering devotion to the Emperor of Mankind by casting your vote, and help us bring the trophy back to Holy Terra! After you've voted, gather your fellow Space Marines over vox and let them know they can cast their vote as well!  The Imperium is counting on you!  - The Space Marine 2 Team

news.title: Капитан Тит против Некронов: Games Workshop раскрыла возможный сюжет Space Marine 3
news.author: Вадим Съедин
news.contents: В рамках Мирового турнира по Warhammer в Атланте компания Games Workshop представила новую кампанию для настольной игры Warhammer 40,000 под названием «500 миров». И она тизерит возможный сюжет Space Marine 3 от Saber Interactive.

news.title: October Community Update
news.author: Khagaï
news.contents: Hello Space Marines!With Halloween creeping closer and Update 11.0 just weeks away, it’s the perfect time to mix the two: so here are a few treats from the game to sink your teeth into. 😉SOMETHING TERRIFYING IS COMING 🦇In the latest Community Update, we gave you a sneak peek of the upcoming new PvE Map and told you it would have a “new boss fight “. Today, we wanted to announce that this new boss is a Tyranid Prime! Except there’s a twist. There’s two of them. You’re welcome. 😁It is a formidable enemy: a winged Tyranid leader beast, the apex of the Tyranid Warrior strain. Its heavy bladed limbs can slice through the toughest targets, so make sure you’re ready.You will meet this foe on "Reclamation", the new Operation map coming with Patch 11.0, which is off-planet. Your mission? Infiltrate the captured ship and destroy it. Along with the new map and Boss fight, new Battlefield Conditions will be implemented to the Stratagems mode, with new weapon variants and armor pieces.​Patch 11.0 -...

news.title: Discord Quest - Redeem your code in just a few steps!
news.author: Hylia
news.contents: Hi all! 🫡Here's a quick tutorial on how to participate in the Discord Quest and quickly redeem your code once the quest is completed!1. Take part in the Discord QuestAccept the Quest on Discord by clicking this link 🔗Play Warhammer 40,000 on Steam for at least 15 minutesGet your in-game reward as a code!2. Redem your codeOnce you have a Redeem Code, head over to this link, sign up or create an account to redeem it!To proceed, you will need to go to your account, redeem your reward and copy/paste your Redeem Code.Once your code is successfully redeemed, the reward will be available in the full game once your link your PROS account in-game by scanning the QR Code.Please note, the Redeem Code is valid from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC): October 16, 2025, 9:00:00 AM to October 23, 2025, 8:59:59 AM.

news.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 стала временно бесплатной
news.author: Rakot
news.contents: В Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 можно поиграть бесплатно с 16 по 23 октября на всех платформах. Разработчики проводят акцию, в рамках которой пользователи консолей и ПК могут запустить командный шутер, не покупая его .

name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails

store.name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails
store.short_description: Sail the high seas, lead mighty fleets, and forge your legacy in War Sails. Bringing naval warfare to Bannerlord for the first time, War Sails lets players command powerful ships, engage in thrilling sea battles, and master maritime conquest.
store.detailed_description:
Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails

Sail the high seas, lead mighty fleets, and forge your legacy in War Sails, the epic single-player expansion for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord. Bringing naval warfare to Bannerlord for the first time, War Sails lets players command powerful ships, engage in thrilling sea battles, and master maritime conquest.

Embark on daring naval adventures with new mechanics, territories, and challenges. Customize your fleet, conquer settlements, and carve your legend on the high seas!

MEET THE NORDS, A NEW VIKING-INSPIRED FACTION

Chart your course to the Northern Kingdom, home of the fearless Nords—legendary seafarers and masters of close-quarters combat. Explore a land of jagged peaks, vast taigas and freezing fjords, where scattered settlements rise like ships from the sea. A bold adventurer may trade their goods, recruit their warriors, join their ranks or challenge their rule. Will you join the North or seize its riches?

MASTER NAVAL WARFARE

War Sails introduces a unique and immersive naval warfare system that has been inspired by accounts of actual medieval sea battles. Featuring realistic wind and water physics, ship-to-ship combat lets you board enemies from multiple points, ram them, or attack from afar.

Captains can seize opportunities by boarding already engaged ships, prepare for an incoming attack by creating a floating fortress or take a risk to tie down several enemies at once - giving their allies an edge elsewhere. They may ram an enemy ship to sink it - or at least throw men off board, shatter oars and compromise buoyancy. Well-placed arrows and ballista fire can also tear through sails, further crippling mobility. 

EXPLORE AN EXPANDED WORLD

Calradia has been reimagined with a northern region, a settled island, coastal waters and open seas. The dynamic weather system was also refined to include storms and trade winds. Ships move faster when riding the gales, but beware—attrition can unravel even the best-laid plans.

The naval systems and Nord faction integrate into Bannerlord’s world, reshaping trade, warfare, and diplomacy. Ship production and new trade goods add regional variety. Coastal towns may grow rich from this — if they can fend off pirates and naval invasions.

Sieges have also been adapted to naval warfare. Armies will have to bring along a fleet and set up a blockade, if they want to stop supplies and reinforcements arriving over sea.

BUILD YOUR FLEET

Players can choose from 18 ship types modelled after historical vessels, each with unique handling, shaped by realistic wind and wave physics. They can be customized with siege engines, cargo holds, sails, rams, and more. Shipyards build and stock vessels based on their town’s culture and development. Players can also capture ships and figureheads in battle. 

EXPAND YOUR ARSENAL

The character system has been extended with Nord hairstyles, beards, and tattoos. Three nautical skills were added that enhance navigation, tactics, and stewardship. There are also many new items including spears, swords, axes, shields, and armor.

Troop trees now include mariner troops that are more effective at sea. Players can also recruit new companions with maritime backgrounds.

LEARN THE ROPES

A new questline introduces players to the seas of Calradia through cinematics, scripted missions, and classic Mount & Blade gameplay. Learn how to command your ship, then take it into battle against a pirate confederacy. Lead a growing fleet of newfound allies as you face a range of nautical challenges.

ENHANCED AUDIO

The sounds of the sea come to life with new Mediterranean and Nordic-inspired musical tracks. Experience rich soundscapes with piercing winds, crashing waves and creaking ships. Feel the heat of battle as steel clashes and sailors cry out.

store.name: Forza Horizon 5
store.short_description: Explore the vibrant open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in the world’s greatest cars.
store.detailed_description:
Forza Horizon 5 Version Comparison


About the Game

Your Ultimate Horizon Adventure awaits! Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.


This is Your Horizon Adventure
Lead breathtaking expeditions across the vibrant and ever-evolving open world landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.


This is a Diverse Open World
Explore a world of striking contrast and beauty. Discover living deserts, lush jungles, historic cities, hidden ruins, pristine beaches, vast canyons and a towering snow-capped volcano.


This is an Adventurous Open World
Immerse yourself in a deep campaign with hundreds of challenges that reward you for engaging in the activities you love. Meet new characters and choose the outcomes of their Horizon Story missions.


This is an Evolving Open World
Take on awe-inspiring weather events such as towering dust storms and intense tropical storms as Mexico’s unique, dynamic seasons change the world every week. Keep coming back for new events, challenges, collectibles, and rewards, and new areas to explore. No two seasons will ever be the same.


This is a Social Open World
Team up with other players and enter the Horizon Arcade for a continuing series of fun, over-the-top challenges that keep you and your friends in the action and having fun with no menus, loading screens or lobbies. Meet new friends in Horizon Open and Tours and share your creations with new community gift sharing.


This is Your Open World
Create your own expressions of fun with the powerful new EventLab gameplay toolset including custom races, challenges, stunts, and entirely new game modes. Customize your cars in more ways than ever before with new options such as the ability open and close convertible tops, paint brake calipers, and more. Use the new Gift Drops feature to share your custom creations with the community.


Begin Your Horizon Adventure today!

Explore a world of striking contrast and beauty. Discover living deserts, lush jungles, historic cities, hidden ruins, pristine beaches, vast canyons and a towering snow-capped volcano.


This is an Adventurous Open World
Immerse yourself in a deep campaign with hundreds of challenges that reward you for engaging in the activities you love. Meet new characters and choose the outcomes of their Horizon Story missions.


This is an Evolving Open World
Take on awe-inspiring weather events such as towering dust storms and intense tropical storms as Mexico’s unique, dynamic seasons change the world every week. Keep coming back for new events, challenges, collectibles, and rewards, and new areas to explore. No two seasons will ever be the same.


This is a Social Open World
Team up with other players and enter the Horizon Arcade for a continuing series of fun, over-the-top challenges that keep you and your friends in the action and having fun with no menus, loading screens or lobbies. Meet new friends in Horizon Open and Tours and share your creations with new community gift sharing.


This is Your Open World
Create your own expressions of fun with the powerful new EventLab gameplay toolset including custom races, challenges, stunts, and entirely new game modes. Customize your cars in more ways than ever before with new options such as the ability open and close convertible tops, paint brake calipers, and more. Use the new Gift Drops feature to share your custom creations with the community.


Begin Your Horizon Adventure today!

news.title: Japan’s Finest Gather at This Week’s Backstage Vote!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: Two legendary rivals from Japan send two of their most popular cars to the Horizon Backstage to get your vote! Pick your favorite pair between Subaru and Nissan starting November 27 until December 4! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40722422/9b888d4ed907066f3bc0b23843edf9ed81e38ad5.jpg Endurance and performance fuse to create the 1990 Subaru LEGACY RS, an all-wheel drive rally wonder with 200 bhp and the same engine that was used in the WRX under the bonnet! Subaru’s second car joining this week’s bout is the 2022 Subaru BRZ. Built in collaboration with Toyota, this edition of the BRZ comes with a new face and even better grip and handling! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40722422/f707fabbada6acc32b884be451e05b4c46e52205.png Their rivals come from none other than Nissan, and their opening act is the 2024 Nissan Z NISMO, a track-ready version of one of Nissan’s biggest hits. The NISMO makeover in this car includes a twin-turbo 3.0-liter V6 engine with 420 horsepower. Closing this week’s battle, one of Mexico’s bi...

news.title: Big, Green, and Mean. Unlock the Durango Hellcat with 20 PTS!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: The everyday racer bonanza wraps up with Dodge’s performance SUV: the 2021 Dodge Durango Hellcat. Built for both comfort and power, the Durango Hellcat can perform like other power rides on the track with its 710-brake horsepower brought to you by its 6.2-liter V8 engine. This means this speedy SUV can reach 100 kmh in just 3.5 seconds. A new set of Bembo brakes, shocks, and wider tires translate all that raw power into excellent handling for any track or road.  Unlock Dodge’s big speed freak with 20 PTS on the Festival Playlist from November 27 until December 4. Close the celebration of daily speed with the rewards available to unlock this final week of High-Performance Dailies.  SERIES REWARDS  80 PTS: 2023 BMW M2     160 PTS: 2021 MG MG6 XPower SPRING REWARDS  20 PTS: 2021 Dodge Durango SRT Hellcat  40 PTS: Backstage Pass   Don’t forget to vote on this week’s Horizon Backstage Vote! Two of the biggest Japanese brands ever put two of their most iconic cars against each other for your...

news.title: American Muscle Clashes with Japanese Speed this Week!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: An international duel takes place at the Horizon Backstage this week, with two Japanese racers taking on American customized vehicles. Which side of the Pacific Ocean are you choosing? First, it’s elegance in motion—Lexus’s staple luxury coupe, the 2021 Lexus LC 500! Voting for this team means voting for a 5.0-liter V8 engine in a car designed to corner as quickly as possible. First appearing in the Japanese Automotive update, the 1995 Toyota MR2 GT returns with its Ferrari-inspired aesthetic and construction to secure your vote! Team America sends a customized monster as the first car on its team—the 2018 DeBerti Ford Mustang GT. On the outside, this car features a personalized look with a unique body kit, rims, lights, and hood; but the inside is pure Mustang power tradition. Teaming up with this wild horse comes a turbocharged natural phenomenon: a pickup rebuilt and repurposed to race—the 1991 GMC Syclone!

news.title: The Party Has Arrived at Horizon Mexico with the 2023 Ford Fiesta ST
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: Time to party with the last production run of the world's favorite street racers, the 2023 Ford Fiesta ST. The premier “boy racing car” comes with a 1.5 turbocharged engine that puts out 236 lb-ft of torque, turning any regular, old drive into a race to beat the clock; and this latest version added some neat changes like an ST bodykit, a new grill, and brakes. One of the Fiesta’s biggest highlights comes in its handling, a precise stirring and tons of grip make this car fly through corners. Unlock, drive, and customize the 2023 Fiesta on the third week of the High-Performance Dailies Festival Playlist for 20 PTS! These are all the rewards returning to Forza Horizon 5 from November 20 until November 27.  SERIES REWARDS   80 PTS: 2023 BMW M2    160 PTS: 2021 MG MG6 XPower  SPRING REWARDS  20 PTS: 2023 Ford Fiesta 40 PTS: Backstage Pass   Try this amazing build for the 1993 Autozam AZ-1. Give this kei car enough power and speed to conquer the S2 Class.  More builds like this one are poste...

news.title: Steam Screenshot Contest: November 19th
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: Win a car*, 500,000 Credits, or 2 Super Wheelspins in this week's Screenshot Contest!This week has an open theme, so try and get creative.Deadline for entries Wednesday, November 26th, 2025 10:00 AM (PT) / 5:00 PM (UTC)To Enter: Compose your screenshot using the in-game photo mode, making sure to meet the competition theme requirements mentioned above.Take the photo and position the Forza Horizon 5 watermark in any corner. Save the photo.Go to your Photo Gallery within the Creative Hub menu and load the photo.Hide the UI and press the Steam screenshot key (default F12).Upload the screenshot to the Forza Horizon 5 Steam Community Hub.Finally, drop a link to your screenshot in this forum thread: Steam Screenshot Contest: November 19th :: Forza Horizon 5 Events & Announcements*(Barn Find, Accolade, or DLC cars cannot be chosen).Event cover image provided by GlamPotatoStar.

news.title: This Week: A Battle Between Modern Saloons and Retro Racers!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: This week, two teams featuring modern machines and retro racers clash at the Horizon Backstage Vote! Both pairs travel between different eras and continents to gather and compete for your vote. Pick your favorite in-game and unlock it with Backstage Passes next week! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40722422/fc1849fd9adec5dc47d58253f41639019800d6b3.jpg A 2.5-liter 6-cylinder engine and excellent suspension system are among the highlights of the first car in this week’s contest: the 1991 Toyota Chaser GT Twin Turbo! Up next is an everyday ride with cranked up performance and the lovely NISMO badge: the 2018 Nissan Sentra NISMO! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40722422/857fb3daeeacbf2351f0feaaced4f98bacdb012b.jpg Dubbed the “Blue Meanie” due to its characteristic color, the first car in the second pair comes from down under: welcome the 1985 HDT VK Commodore Group A! Closing this week’s selection is a luxurious and powerful AWD saloon: the 2021 Bentley Flying Spur. Which pair is your favorite this time around? {ST...

news.title: A Camry Built for Top Performance Returns!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: It's amazing how three letters can change your daily drive into a street racing performance piece.  The 2023 Toyota Camry TRD’s embodies this concept with its new kit featuring a front splitter, side aero skirts, a rear diffuser, and a rear spoiler to reduce drag. But the changes in the TRD are not just cosmetic, the performance spirit of its design is also noticeable in the 3.5-liter V6 engine sitting inside of the car; new sports brakes and larger wheels improve handling as well making this car a joy to drive and surprise your pears on a race to the office. Unlock the TRD with 20 PTS from November 13 until November 20 on the Festival Playlist!   SERIES REWARDS   80 PTS: 2023 BMW M2    160 PTS: 2021 MG MG6 XPower  SPRING REWARDS  20 PTS: 2023 Toyota Camry TRD 40 PTS: Backstage Pass  Catch High-Performance Dailies’ distinctive tank, the Business Suit Tank, during its lunch break for this week’s Collectibles challenge: Lunch Break! You will be tasked to interrupt this little guy’s break...

news.title: Hatchbacks Ally with Sports Coupes to Take Over the Horizon Backstage!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: Two pairs, four cars, and ten doors make up this week’s car battle royale. Pick your favorite pair in-game and acquire Backstage Passes each week to unlock cars on Horizon Backstage. Which team is getting your vote this time around? {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40722422/e36f5ff19bf5631371b3d2143329d9dfa53c9d28.png To start this week’s battle, we welcome the 2020 Hyundai i30N. First introduced to Forza Horizon 5 during the Lunar New Year update, this car features a 2.0-liter engine and a new body kit, making it a solid contender for your favorite hatchback. Everyone’s favorite bubble-shaped car completes the first team; the 2020 Audi TT RS Coupe is an amazing grip built to drive on every track! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/40722422/25c96356a703015182dbbabff5a0c15e3ff9fa5c.jpg Only 250 units of this battle’s next contender were ever built. Please put your hands together for the 2013 Volvo C30 Polestar, Volvo’s unique hatchback made in collaboration with their partner, Polestar. Closing out this week’s conte...

news.title: The Hottest Ford Focus Returns this Week!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: New face, same driving sensation, the 2022 Ford Focus ST is this week’s 20 PTS Reward Car. A new hood, badge placement, and front grill start this car’s highlights, then we move to what’s inside: a 2.3-liter turbocharged engine that creates 276 bhp.  However, what we are all looking for when getting inside of a Focus, is the driving experience; of course, the 2022 model does not disappoint, pairing a great engine with larger wheels and sports suspension makes your everyday runs feel like timed laps on a circuit.  Unlock this car and create a unique version of this car with the available seven body parts including 2 front bumpers, a rear wing, 2 rear bumpers, a side skirt, and hood. High-powered everyday racers takeover the Horizon Festival’s roads during the next four weeks:   SERIES REWARDS  80 PTS: 2023 BMW M2   160 PTS: 2023 Lucid Air  SPRING REWARDS  20 PTS: 2022 Ford Focus ST Backstage Pass   Racing is an art form, or at least that’s what you’ll say with the new Artist Oufit avail...

news.title: Hyper Extravagance Fills All the Slots of this Week’s Pairs!
news.author: T10_Artie
news.contents: We have an eclectic roundup this week! All four cars featured in this week’s duel are unique and will definitely give your garage bonus points for style. Take a look and cast your vote in-game today! Ride all the way to Valhalla in the 2023 Aston Martin Valkyrie, the British F1 experience super car fitted with a V12 which Aston Martin calls “a marvel.” Teaming up with modern glory is a blast from the past; the 1939 Maserati 8CTF completes this pair with its retro charm. Their opponents start with a car built and bred for the track. Rejoice in the sound of the 2008 Koenigsegg CCGT’s 5.0-liter V8 engine and its supreme aerodynamic design. A different type of retro ride wraps up this week’s battle; the 2016 Hot Wheels 2Jetz is a jet-powered car designed to drag race and stunt on the orange tracks!

store.name: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
store.short_description: A storm is coming. Venture into the complete Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT on PC; forge your own path through this open-world action adventure and uncover its hidden wonders. Brought to you by Sucker Punch Productions, Nixxes Software and PlayStation Studios.
store.detailed_description:
Steam Exclusive Offer

Link your Steam account with your account for PlayStation™Network and gain access to the following early unlocks:

  • Archery Master’s Attire
  • Charm of Canine Recruitment


About the Game

For the very first time on PC, play through Jin Sakai’s journey and discover the complete Ghost of Tsushima experience in this Director’s Cut.

In the late 13th century, the Mongol empire has laid waste to entire nations along their campaign to conquer the East. Tsushima Island is all that stands between mainland Japan and a massive Mongol invasion fleet led by the ruthless and cunning general, Khotun Khan.

As the island burns in the wake of the first wave of the Mongol assault, courageous samurai warrior Jin Sakai stands resolute. As one of the last surviving members of his clan, Jin is resolved to do whatever it takes, at any cost, to protect his people and reclaim his home. He must set aside the traditions that have shaped him as a warrior to forge a new path, the path of the Ghost, and wage an unconventional war for the freedom of Tsushima.

  • Experience Ghost of Tsushima with unlocked framerates and a variety of graphics options tailored to a wide range of hardware, ranging from high-end PCs to portable PC gaming devices.*

  • Get a view of even more of the action with support for Ultrawide (21:9), Super Ultrawide (32:9) and even 48:9 Triple Monitor support.*

  • Boost performance with upscaling and frame generation technologies like NVIDIA DLSS 3, AMD FSR 3 and Intel XeSS. NVIDIA Reflex and image quality-enhancing NVIDIA DLAA are also supported.**

  • Japanese lip sync – enjoy a more authentic experience with lip sync for Japanese voiceover, made possible by cinematics being rendered in real time by your PC.

  • Choose how you control the action: experience haptic feedback and adaptive triggers through a wired DualSense™ controller…***

  • …or go with mouse and keyboard, with fully customizable controls.

  • Haptic feedback – master your blade through the DualSense™ controller’s immersive haptic feedback.***

  • Adaptive triggers – enhance your accuracy with a bow using adaptive trigger resistance.***

* Compatible PC and display device required.

** Compatible PC and graphics card required.

*** Wired connection required to experience the full range of in-game controller features.

package_groups.title: Buy Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT

content_descriptors.notes: Ghost of Tsushima is an action game set in feudal Japan. Players take the role of Jin Sakai, a samurai risking everything to defend Tsushima from the Mongol invaders pillaging the land. Players travel the Japanese countryside helping civilians and defending them from the Mongol invaders. Frequent sword battles take place in 3rd person melee and ranged combat. Successful attacks can result in dismemberment and decapitation, often accompanied by large blood-splatter effects. Players can also use stealth to take out enemies unseen, with assassination kills. Cinematics and other scenes show other examples of intense violence and gore, including a scene where a civilian is burned alive, a scene showing a person beheaded and the decapitated man’s head held up towards the camera. Red blood can be seen in environments, on clothing, and spraying from successful attacks.

news.title: Save 33% on Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut!
news.author: Team_Nixxes
news.contents: For the very first time on PC, play through Jin Sakai’s journey and discover the complete Ghost of Tsushima experience in this Director’s Cut. Ghost of Tsushima Director’s Cut is an action-adventure game set in feudal Japan. Protagonist Jin Sakai was raised and trained in the ways of the samurai. His world is shattered when a Mongol invasion defeats the samurai army of his home on Tsushima island, and he is faced with a difficult decision: honor the tradition and customs of his upbringing and maintain a fight he cannot win, or deviate from his samurai path to protect the island and its people by any means necessary. Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut is 33% off during the PlayStation PC Summer Sale! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2215430/ Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut PC Features Get a view of even more of the action with support for Ultrawide (21:9), Super Ultrawide (32:9) and even 48:9 Triple Monitor support.* Boost performance with upscaling and frame generation technologies li...

news.title: Assassin's Creed Shadows' earliest mods include one that aims to make it look like Ghost of Tsushima, as reshaders Kanabo-slap the contrast up to max
news.contents: Assassin's Creed Shadows is now here, attracting hordes of players, being pretty good, and also making certain sections social media act like utter knobs. As with any big release that hits PC, that means a bunch of mods early doors, with folks already seeking to start putting their own spin on the game in a couple of classic ways. Read more

news.title: Thank you for nominating Ghost of Tsushima for the Steam Awards!
news.author: Nixxes_Community
news.contents: Hey everyone, We are incredibly proud to have Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut on PC nominated for two Steam Awards! We're honored to see so many of you enjoying Jin Sakai's story and considering us for the Outstanding Story-Rich Game Award. We're equally grateful for the nominations for the Best Game You Suck At Award. Listen, there's no shame in lowering that difficulty setting. Honor died on the beach, but you don't have to! If these nominations resonate with you, we'd love for you to cast your vote using the buttons above. On behalf of the teams at Sucker Punch and Nixxes: we wish you happy holidays and thank YOU for playing Ghost of Tsushima on PC! Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut is 20% off during the Steam Winter Sale! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2215430

store.name: Dying Light: The Beast
store.short_description: BECOME THE BEAST. SURVIVE THE NIGHT. A terrifying new chapter in the Dying Light universe begins. As Kyle Crane, explore the vast and unpredictable wilderness, uncover a deadly evolution of the infected, and learn to control the beastly powers awakening inside you.
store.detailed_description:
Deluxe Edition

Take your Dying Light: The Beast experience to another level with the Deluxe Edition. You'll receive the Official Soundtrack, wallpapers, and the Castor Woods Prepper Bundle, as well as a detailed tourist map that highlights locations worth exploring.

INCLUDES:
– Official Soundtrack
– Wallpaper Pack
– Castor Woods Tourist Map
– Castor Woods Prepper Bundle
– Castor Woods Prepper Outfit
– Survivalist SMG
– Roadhog


Editions


About the Game

Dying Light: The Beast is the next AAA Dying Light game and the best-reviewed entry in the franchise’s history. Packed with more than 40 hours of survival adventure, both in single-player and shared progression co-op, it delivers the most ambitious, modern and content-rich Dying Light experience ever created. Immerse yourself in the expansive open world of Castor Woods and get lost in the scope, atmosphere and innovation of this must-play survival horror.

A terrifying new chapter in the Dying Light universe begins. As Kyle Crane, explore the vast and unpredictable wilderness, uncover a deadly evolution of the infected, and learn to control the beastly powers awakening inside you.

"The Beast really is Dying Light 3.” - GamesRadar+

The highest-rated Dying Light game ever, shaped by a decade of Techland’s experience with the series. Everything fans love - immersion, exploration, physical FPP melee combat, grounded parkour, and the iconic day–night cycle - refined and elevated to the next level. A perfect return for veterans, and the ideal entry point for newcomers.

"Kyle Crane Steals The Show And Gives Dying Light Its Best Story Yet" - The Gamer

Dive into a gripping tale of vengeance filled with twists, shifting alliances, and characters you’re never sure you can trust. Follow Kyle Crane’s powerful journey as his fight for justice uncovers reveals dangers far greater than he ever imagined.

"Techland perfectly nailed it, the Beast Mode really makes you feel like you could tear through anything" - WCCFtech

Play as Kyle Crane, a hero with the DNA of both man and beast. Freely switch between two playstyles and face a fierce conflict that lead to the acceptance of the monster within.

"Melee combat is once again a highlight of the game, with heft behind every attempt to take out a zombie, and so many different weapons and modifiers to choose from" - Gamespot

Feel the full force of Dying Light’s most physical combat yet. Your blows land with real momentum, enemies react believably, and your emerging beast-like abilities add intensity without losing the challenge and immersion.

"The night continues to be one of Dying Light’s greatest gameplay" - GamingBIBLE

The distinct experiences of night and day, a signature of the Dying Light series, merge into one unique whole. Explore and scavenge by day, but remember the constantly ticking clock. Because once the sun sets, the night unleashes horrors that leave you with just three choices: run, hide or fight for your life.

"Running, sliding, jumping, climbing, and hopping around Castor Woods is a treat" - Kotaku

Feel the adrenaline rush of best-in-class first-person parkour. Jump from rooftop to rooftop and overcome any obstacle. And when that’s not enough, grab the wheel of an off-road vehicle and ruthlessly tear through hordes of zombies.

"Techland brings its A-game when it comes to crafting a densely interactive, photorealistic world that frequently takes my breath away" - GamesRadar+

Next-gen visuals bring the hand-crafted zombie apocalypse to life. Every detail tells a story of survival. Lose yourself in the majesty of Castor Woods: explore the tourist town, industrial area, national park, farmland, swamps and more. All full of beauty… and decay.

"Playing the game with friends is creating a different kind of experience" - GameRant

Band together with up to three other players in co-op! Brave the dangers of Castor Woods, where you can experience every encounter, every discovery and every twist as a unit with shared progress.

news.title: Find out more about our biggest update yet!
news.author: tech_ncar
news.contents: Update 1.4 has been out for a few days now, bringing the biggest and most impactful changes Dying Light: The Beast has seen so far!Players have been diving into the update’s long-awaited features, new content, and hundreds of improvements to gameplay, visuals, and performance, all of which make the experience more immersive than ever.New Game+: Replay Kyle’s explosive story with all your gear, weapons, and progression intact. Each run increases the challenge but also rewards you with better loot and rarer weapons, letting you push even deeper into the toughest threats Castor Woods has to offer. Legend Levels: If you’re already maxed out, you can now climb the new Legend Levels and earn exclusive rewards—legendary weapons, gear, and more. You’ll also be able to use the Legend Points you earn to unlock new passive skills, also in Beast Mode.Ray Tracing (PC only): Enhanced visuals with more realistic lighting, shadows, and reflections elevate the atmosphere of Castor Woods, making it even...

news.title: Update 1.4 - Video Dev Diary
news.author: tech_ncar
news.contents: Dying Light: The Beast has just received its largest and most significant update to date! Update 1.4 introduces exciting new content - New Game + and Legend Levels, Ray Tracing on PC, and 400+ improvements and fixes across gameplay, movement, combat, co-op, audio, and performance, making the game even more immersive and reinforcing its position as the biggest and best-rated survival horror adventure released this year. Watch our latest dev diary, where Bartłomiej Witych - Producer, and Tymon Smektała - Dying Light Franchise Director, share more insights into the update’s new features. There has never been a better time to jump back in - or begin your journey in Castor Woods!

news.title: Call of the Beast: Week 7
news.author: tech_ncar
news.contents: With Update 1.4 just released, there’s never been a better time to jump into Dying Light: The Beast! New Game+, Legend Levels, a Double XP event, and an exclusive weapon waiting in your stash should already convince you to dive back in. So don’t wait - team up with the Dying Light community to tackle this week’s challenge, focused entirely on executing brutal finishers on enemies. And while you're at it, make sure to try out the new finishers added to the game!Community Challenge: Executioner Goal #1: Execute 1,000,000 finishersReward: Gutsbuster Car SkinGoal #2: Execute 2,500,000 finishersReward: RascalCall of the Beast Week 7 runs from Thursday, November 27 at 4PM CEST until Thursday, December 4 at 4PM CET.As always, rewards will be distributed to your in-game stash at the end of the challenge. To track the community’s progress and see how close you are to earning them, head to Dying Light Outpost.

news.title: Update 1.4
news.author: tech_ncar
news.contents: NEW CONTENTNEW GAME+You can now replay Kyle’s story in New Game+ while keeping all gear, weapons and character progression from your first playthrough. Enemy difficulty is increased, but you’ll also encounter higher-tier weapons and loot to match the challenge. New Game+ can be repeated multiple times - each completed run further raises the game’s difficulty level and unlocks access to even stronger and rarer weapons, as well as the toughest enemies in Castor Woods. LEGEND LEVELSLegend Levels is the classic Dying Light end-game progression system that extends your character beyond the main skill tree.Once you reach Level 15, all earned XP is converted into Legend XP. Higher difficulty settings and higher New Game+ tiers increase XP gains, so the more you challenge yourself, the faster you progress.Each Legend Level grants Legend Points that you can spend on passive upgrades such as increased health, improved combat stats and stronger Beast Mode performance. Every level also raises your...

news.title: If you've left Castor Woods behind, the new Dying Light The Beast update gives you some very good reasons to return
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: While you can spend dozens of happy hours shooting, slashing, and drop-kicking zombies in Dying Light The Beast (trust me, I would know), the most dedicated players have likely hit the end of the line by now. If you've rolled credits, completed every quest, and got your gear exactly in the spot you want, you've probably moved on by now. However, the new Dying Light The Beast update is designed to lure all you hardcore players back. While hundreds of improvements and visual enhancements arrive in patch 1.4, the biggest additions help create an even deeper endgame experience. Legend Levels and New Game Plus are finally here. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Dying Light The Beast docket codes November 2025 New Dying Light The Beast update makes your enemies value their lives more, but you don't have to accept their surrender Dying Light The Beast reveals 11 weeks of freebies and its most-requested new mode

news.title: The Steam Awards 2025 - We Need You!
news.author: RM
news.contents: Dying Light: The Beast is the next full-scale AAA game in the Dying Light series and the highest-rated entry in the franchise so far. With over 40+ hours of survival adventure, you can dive in solo or team up in co-op with shared progression. It’s the most ambitious and content-packed Dying Light experience ever, full of intense action, rich world-building, and endless surprises. Fans and critics love its scope, atmosphere, and innovative gameplay, making it a must-play open world survival horror of the year. We’re continuing to support the game, with upcoming big updates such as New Game+, Legend Levels, and Ray Tracing. Now, we’re counting on you - help Dying Light: The Beast earn nominations in this year’s Steam Awards!Categories we’d love you to nominate us in:Game of the YearBest Game on Steam DeckBetter with FriendsOutstanding Visual StyleMost Innovative Gameplay AwardBest Game You Suck AtBest SoundtrackOutstanding Story - Rich GameOur team is counting on you! - nominate Dying Li...

news.title: Call of the Beast: Week 6
news.author: pelikn_techland
news.contents: To survive in this post-apo world, you need to make something out of nothing! Whether it’s a weapon, healing supply or anything else, these might just keep you alive to see the next sunrise.Community Challenge: Master Craftsman Goal #1: 20,000,000 items crafted Reward: Redwood RunnerGoal #2: 35,000,000 items crafted Reward: ShankerCall of the Beast Week 6 runs from Thursday, November 20 at 4PM CET until Thursday, November 27 at 4PM CET.As before, the rewards won’t be sent to your in-game stash as soon as the goal is completed. Instead, they will be distributed at the end of the challenge. Also, to know how close the community is to victory and your rewards, head to Dying Light Outpost to see the progression.Start crafting any and everything you can. Your rewards depend on it.

news.title: Save Up to 25% Off Dying Light: The Beast
news.author: pelikn_techland
news.contents: For the first time since launch, Dying Light: The Beast is 20% OFF during the Black Friday Sale. There’s never been a better moment to jump in! And if you want to experience Kyle Crane’s journey from the start, you can also pick up Dying Light with up to 80% OFF right now! But we want to always give our amazing community even more! So, enjoy 25% OFF Dying Light: The Beast if you already own either Dying Light or Dying Light 2: Stay Human with the Dying Light Loyalty Program. And our appreciation doesn’t stop there. Anyone who owns any Dying Light game (including Dying Light: The Beast) will also receive a 25%-off coupon for Dying Light: The Beast for Steam to share with a friend. This coupon can be found on Dying Light Outpost. Redeem it exclusively on dyinglightgame.com/buy-now or the Loyalty Program page on Dying Light Outpost. The Black Friday Sale and Dying Light Loyalty Program are available until December 2, 2025. So, you know what to do! UNLEASH THE BEAST

news.title: Call of the Beast: Week 5
news.author: pelikn_techland
news.contents: Last week, you showed that you can run for your life. Now, it’s time to go wild and unleash the Beast! Take out any infected you find walking around Castor Woods and let’s smash this challenge together!Community Challenge: Beast Mode Engaged! Goal #1: 6,000,000 Infected Killed during Beast Mode Reward: Blood DriveGoal #2: 12,000,000 Infected Killed during Beast Mode Reward: Ol’ RustyCall of the Beast Week 5 runs from Thursday, November 13 at 4PM CET until Thursday, November 20 at 4PM CET.As before, the rewards won’t be sent to your in-game stash as soon as the goal is completed. Instead, they will be distributed at the end of the challenge. Also, to know how close the community is to victory and your rewards, head to Dying Light Outpost to see the progression.https://store.steampowered.com/app/3008130/Dying_Light_The_Beast/

news.title: Call of the Beast: Week 4
news.author: pelikn_techland
news.contents: We’re over a quarter of the way through Call of the Beast and it’s time for some Epic Rewards! We hope you enjoyed being the hunter last week, because you’re gonna become the hunted. This week’s all about being chased by the ‘Kings of the Night’ and, hopefully, living to tell the tale.Community Challenge: Run for Your Life Goal #1: 2,000,000 km meters covered during Chases Reward: NighthawkGoal #2: 4,000,000 km meters covered during Chases Reward: NightbloodCall of the Beast Week 4 runs from Thursday, November 6 at 4PM CET until Thursday, November 13 at 4PM CET.As before, the rewards won’t be sent to your in-game stash as soon as the goal is completed. Instead, they will be distributed at the end of the challenge. Also, to know how close the community is to victory and your rewards, head to Dying Light Outpost to see the progression.The Volatiles are waiting for their snacks… just make sure you’re not one of them!https://store.steampowered.com/app/3008130/Dying_Light_The_Beast/

store.name: Split Fiction
store.short_description: Embrace mind-blowing moments as you’re pulled deep into the many worlds of Split Fiction, a boundary-pushing co-op adventure.
store.detailed_description:
CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED



About the Game

Embrace mind-blowing moments as you’re pulled deep into the many worlds of Split Fiction, a boundary-pushing co-op action adventure from the studio behind 2021 Game of the Year Winner, It Takes Two. Mio and Zoe are contrasting writers – one writes sci-fi and the other writes fantasy – who become trapped in their own stories after being hooked up to a machine designed to steal their creative ideas. They’ll have to rely on each other to break free with their memories in-tact, working together to master a variety of abilities and overcome diverse challenges while jumping between sci-fi and fantasy worlds in this unexpected tale of friendship.

Split Fiction is a unique action-adventure experience that keeps you on the edge of your couch with unexpected moments. One minute you’re taming adorable dragons and the next you’re fighting as cyber ninjas, escaping terrifying trolls, or dodging hover cars thrown by a robotic parking attendant. It’s weird, it’s wild, and it’s designed to be shared.

Grab your co-op partner and get ready to overcome any obstacle thrown your way.

You consent to any personal data collected through your use of EA's services being transferred to the United States, as further explained in the Privacy & Cookie Policy. You must link your EA and Steam Accounts to access online features; EA may share your Account ID &/or individual game and play records with Steam to validate your purchase &/or refund request. Access to software content is limited to one EA &/or one Steam Account & is non-transferable after purchase. You may need to be 13+ or 16+ to register for an EA Account (age may vary, see o.ea.com/ea/child-access for details). Some content may require gameplay to unlock. Content updates may be downloaded automatically, require additional storage, and incur bandwidth usage fees. EA may provide certain free incremental content &/or updates. news.title: Состоялся релиз русской локализации Split Fiction от Mechanics VoiceOver
news.author: Rakot
news.contents: Группа Mechanics VoiceOver объявила о выпуске неофициальной русской локализации Split Fiction. Авторы поблагодарили поклонников за поддержу и сообщили, что скачать озвучку можно в соцсетях .

Get 75% off It Takes Two and embark on a crazy journey built purely for two co-op players. As Cody and M...

news.title: Split Fiction & It Takes Two Soundtrack Out Now
news.author: Electronic Arts
news.contents: The Split Fiction and long-overdue It Takes Two soundtracks are now available on Steam!It’s the perfect way to revisit Mio and Zoe’s story of friendship. Oh, and if you're still humming the award-winning tunes of It Takes Two, that soundtrack is now available too!

news.title: Mechanics VoiceOver показала процесс озвучки Split Fiction для ПК
news.author: Rakot
news.contents: Студия Mechanics VoiceOver поделилась фрагментом записи русской озвучки Split Fiction для ПК. В ролике можно увидеть актёров и актрис за работой, а также фрагменты геймплея со спойлерами. Видео демонстрирует ключевые сюжетные повороты, поэтому его не рекомендуется смотреть, чтобы не испортить впечатления от последующего прохождения.

news.title: Get 10% Off Split Fiction!
news.author: esnelling
news.contents: It's the perfect time to jump into the boundary-pushing co-op adventures of Split Fiction, from the studio of It Takes Two! Get 10% off the critically-acclaimed game between Sep 11-Sep 25*, grab a friend, and get ready to overcome any obstacle thrown your way. *Offers may vary or change. See retailer for details. **Friend’s Pass requires installation of the Friend’s Pass, persistent internet connection and applicable platform account. One user must own the full game in order for the co-op player to play the full game.

news.title: Энтузиасты выпустили второй демо-трейлер русской озвучки Split Fiction для ПК
news.author: Rakot
news.contents: Студия Mechanics VoiceOver опубликовала второй трейлер неофициального отечественного дубляжа Split Fiction для ПК. Команда провела демонстрацию, в которой познакомила зрителей с русскими голосами нескольких новых персонажей и показала небольшую нарезку закулисья локализации игры.

news.title: Sony и Amazon сражаются за адаптацию Split Fiction
news.author: Rakot
news.contents: Deadline сообщает, что экранизация Split Fiction вызвала большой интерес у представителей киноиндустрии. После ошеломляющих результатов адаптации игры Minecraft в прокате Sony и Amazon с её MGM Studios готовы выделить на производство миллионы долларов. Последняя занимает более выгодную позицию в переговорах и собирается заключить сделку к началу следующей недели.

news.title: Split Fiction has sold 4 Million copies!
news.author: Joe_EA
news.contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45343552/224e6633304dd8623b1975e4858791ff6b905a1c.jpg 4 MILLION SOLD!!!! So many of you have picked up Split Fiction already, it’s amazing… 🤯 Seeing the fun you have with our game and the love you show for Mio, Zoe and each other warms our hearts here at Hazelight ❤️ And so many hot dogs made… 😨 If you are looking for someone to play with, join the Hazelight Studios Discord today and find the Mio to your Zoe in the Looking For Game channels! {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/45343552/d1d7577c73ae0135760c794a8fdca24d3d22ba41.gif https://store.steampowered.com/app/2001120/Split_Fiction/

news.title: Split Fiction нашла 4 миллиона покупателей — Electronic Arts очень довольна
news.author: Deacon
news.contents: Hazelight Studios отпраздновала успех Split Fiction (наш обзор) — кооперативная игра разошлась тиражом более 4 миллионов копий . Electronic Arts поделилась статистикой в ходе презентации квартального отчета, назвав запуск детища Юсефа Фареса "невероятно успешным".

news.title: Sydney Sweeney To Star in Split Fiction’s Big Film Adaptation
news.author: Philip Watson
news.contents: After news of a bidding war for film rights escalated, the film adaptation of Hazelight Studios’ Split Fiction video game has cast Sydney Sweeney as a lead for the film. Just one month ago it was revealed that Hazelight Studios’ latest co-op game, Split Fiction, would be coming to the silver screen if Hollywood wants. During the Game Developers Conference 2025, unnamed sources claimed the media company Story Kitchen was putting together a package of movie professionals to make the film adaptation movie rights more appealing. At the time of that report, “top Hollywood studios” have reportedly made offers for the film rights. The previous reports of media company Story Kitchen’s involvement have now been confirmed, as Variety reports today the Split Fiction film will be produced by Mike Goldberg and Dmitri M. Johnson’s Story Kitchen (formerly known as dj2 Entertainment). On top of Story Kitchen’s involvement, popular actress Sydney Sweeney has just... Read more

store.name: Warframe
store.short_description: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and battle alongside your friends in this story-driven free-to-play online action game
store.detailed_description:
Confront warring factions throughout a sprawling interplanetary system as you follow the guidance of the mysterious Lotus and level up your Warframe, build an Arsenal of destructive firepower, and realize your true potential across massive open worlds in this thrilling, genre-defining third-person combat experience.

BECOME A POWERFUL WARRIOR

Enter your Warframe: a bio-metal suit of untold power. Unleash its Abilities and wield a vast array of devastating weaponry to effortlessly annihilate hordes of enemies on sight. And when the slaughter is over, you can earn or instantly unlock 40+ different Warframes - each with a unique suite of powers - to re-experience the mayhem any way you want.

BATTLE ALONGSIDE FRIENDS

Form a Squad with your friends and earn valuable bonus Rewards when you complete Missions together via highly collaborative, co-op gameplay. Utilize your Warframe’s Abilities to heal allies, redirect enemy fire, and achieve your objectives. Stuck on a particular challenge? In-game matchmaking makes it easy to connect with friendly Tenno whenever you need an extra hand.

EXPLORE A MASSIVE SYSTEM

Deftly maneuver through ground-based Missions with your Warframe’s mesmerizing parkour skills, or take to the stars and engage in massive ship-to-ship battles in your very own customizable spacecraft. Lose yourself within mysterious open-world landscapes and discover a system teeming with fascinating lifeforms - both friendly and hostile.

DISCOVER AN EPIC STORY

Marvel at the sweeping history of the Origin System as you experience Warframe’s massive cinematic narrative spanning 5 separate expansions and 30+ story-based Quests. Discover the power within and experience your first taste of invincibility with one of three original Warframes before you begin your journey, develop your skills and seek out the truth behind your awakening.

MASTER YOUR ARSENAL

Your starter Weapons are just the beginning. Craft hundreds of destructive armaments, plus vehicles, Companions and more. Level them up and experiment until you find the right combination of gear that suits your unique playstyle. Fashion your weaponry for a fearsome look to compliment your custom-designed loadout.

CUSTOMIZE ENDLESSLY

Entering the Origin System means joining legions of friendly Tenno, each with their own personalized Warframes, Weapons and gear. With a staggering number of Customization options available to enhance your Loadout, designing the perfect look for your Warframe makes for an endlessly rewarding challenge for you and your Squad.
