news.title: Tennobaum 2025
news.author: andrew.ellyatt
news.contents: Tennobaum returns to spread holiday cheer throughout the Tauron Academy! Participate in the Holiday Card Contest and support Big Brothers Big Sisters London by helping us reach our goal of sending 100,000 in-game gifts to receive all-new, joyous Rewards. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/4437469/78bff2a84b893fe297a185a813ce9fe78c7ff64d.png

news.title: Warframe's next big, WWI-inspired story update happened because a developer wrote the words 'Trench Warframe' on a whiteboard
news.author: Lincoln Carpenter
news.contents: Warframe's next major update, The Old Peace, is a doozy. When it releases on Wednesday, December 10, it'll be the first time Warframe players get a firsthand look at the Tau system that's been mythologized by more than a decade of in-game storytelling, witnessed as their characters relive induced war flashbacks from a forgotten, failed ceasefire in the interstellar conflict that defined Warframe's past, present, and future... Read more.

news.title: The Old Peace Update Launches December 10
news.author: bloates
news.contents: The wait is almost over! Distant and long-hidden memories of Tau will bloom spectacularly on December 10 when our next major update arrives across all platforms – as confirmed during the final Devstream of 2025. Whisking Tenno on a journey through their own repressed memories of the Old War, The Old Peace brings a bevy of significant new additions to the Warframe canon, including the next chapter of our ongoing Cinematic Quest, new game modes The Descendia and The Perita Rebellion, a highly-anticipated expansion to the Focus School system, as well as the demonic Uriel Warframe, new Protoframes (and ways to romance them), a new Bayonet weapon class, Voruna Deluxe and more. …all of which will help set the stage for an even larger, Tau-focused update to come later in 2026. We've been hard at work since first announcing The Old Peace during TennoCon 2025, and can't wait for you to get your hands on the full update next month. We'll have much more coverage of The Old Peace to share with you...

news.title: Gyre Prime Access
news.author: bloates
news.contents: Equal parts enchanting and electrifying, Gyre pirouettes into Prime Access on December 10 alongside the release of The Old Peace! Flourished with Orokin gold, Gyre Prime leaps into the spotlight with her signature Prime Weapons and exclusive Prime Accessories. Take advantage of instant access while you can. Acquire only the Prime items you want by selecting from the Weapons, Prime, Complete and Accessories Packs, depending on your platform and preferences. You can also earn Gyre Prime and her signature Prime Weapons in-game by collecting and cracking Void Relics! Gyre Prime Access includes: Gyre Prime Gilded circuits spark and energize frenetic movements that echo through the ages. Dance into eternity with galvanizing grace. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/4437469/e564ddb5ef94a25d3f7425656f02568cca5bdf34.png Alternox Prime Orokin gold enhances the conductivity of Gyre Prime's signature rifle, enabling it to fire massive electrifying orbs. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/4437469/a46fc3b000e194f809d39276ad6e5783c...

news.title: TennoCon 2026 Tickets on Sale February 27, 2026
news.author: lemlemPrime
news.contents: Mark your calendars Tenno — Warframe’s biggest celebration makes its grand return to London, Ontario from July 10 to 11! As revealed during Devstream 191, you can buy your ticket on Eventbrite: February 27 at 4 p.m. ET. TennoCon 2026 brings together everything you love. Join the community, show off your cosplay, attend developer panels, dive into hands-on activities, and witness the massive reveals during our annual TennoLive keynote. Plus, enjoy the reimagined fan-favorite TennoConcert with a night of live Warframe music at Canada Life Place! Make sure to sign up for an Eventbrite account ahead of time so you’re ready when they are available. Click on the "Details" button on the Eventbrite page to see ticket tier information. Tenno who purchase any tier of the ticket (including General Admission, a VIP Ticket, or a Legendary Ticket) will also receive the in-game 2026 TennoCon Digital Pack! TennoCon 2026 Ticket Tiers {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/4437469/53892a65bfab1b41250c019de2becdba6b1a360a.p...

news.title: Warframe's The Old Peace skip is "sh*tty" for some, but it's Digital Extremes' "survival strategy" in a busy crowd
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: In the past year alone, I've plowed well over 50 hours into Warframe. Whether it's farming materials, decorating my Orbiter, or going back and forth on what color really looks the best on Oraxia, it's very easy to find yourself awake at 3am bopping Grineer and watching the damage numbers soar. But, as a newer player, I found the initial grind to be quite the hurdle - while things pick up with the Natah quest, the initial Awakening missions feel like a series of disparate parts that have no real rhyme or reason to them. As someone who has been desperate to get to the Warframe 1999 content and is invested in the MMO's world, I'm happy to put up with the grind, but I understand why some others would play a few hours and call it a day. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Warframe 1999 was the "furthest stretch of the rubber band," but The Old Peace offers "the most soulslike thing" DE has ever done Warframe codes December 2025 and how to redeem Warframe The Old Peace is pulling me...

news.title: Warframe 1999 was the "furthest stretch of the rubber band," but The Old Peace offers "the most soulslike thing" DE has ever done
news.author: editor@pcgamesn.com
news.contents: "War is hell," Warframe's creative director Rebecca Ford says as community director Megan Everett tears through the hordes in the new Perita Rebellion mode. It's a phrase the duo continue to repeat during our preview of The Old Peace, the latest chapter in the MMO's saga. In many ways, it's fitting: while the 12-minute war that Everett finds herself embroiled in certainly is hellish, the quest's adjacent plotline, The Devil's Triad, adds the new 'devilframe' Uriel and Descendia mode, both of which are inspired by classical depictions of Dante's Inferno and other religious iconography. "It's not a coincidence that there's a devil Frame, and that an Orokin has an unfortunate relationship with that devil Frame," Ford says with a smile. "None of this is an accident." Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Warframe's The Old Peace skip is "sh*tty" for some, but it's Digital Extremes' "survival strategy" in a busy crowd Warframe codes November 2025 and how to redeem Warframe The Old Pe...

Save 50% on the Encore Collection, 1999 Collection, and the Starter Weapon Pack for a limited time. These are the biggest discounts we’ve ever offered — don’t miss them. news.author: Nilae
news.contents: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/4437469/a3798cae6c60cc4fb746bc140c0cfbe2e0a2e081.png Offer your allies a restorative touch or virtuous sanctuary with Prime Resurgence! Add Wisp Prime and Hildryn Prime, along with signature Prime Weapons and Prime Accessories, to your Arsenal instantly with Regal Aya. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/4437469/13a2e6da212b2fb143212a721e1caaa74af61a50.png

news.title: Devstream #191
news.author: [DE] Juice
news.contents: Hi Tenno! We don’t know how it happened, but we’re at the last Devstream of 2025! Don’t miss Devstream #191 this Friday, November 28th at 2 PM ET! The team is setting the last scene for our next major update, The Old Peace. Set your sights on the launch date, witness the Focus School expansion with each respective Tauron Strike, recall buried battlefield memories in the new gamemode Perita Rebellion, and much more! Tune in and watch from start to finish to earn an Omni Forma (Built) Twitch Drop! See you at https://twitch.tv/warframe on November 28th at 2 PM ET!See you online!

store.name: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE
store.short_description: Solo Leveling, the webtoon with 14.3 billion views worldwide, is now an action RPG game! Help our hero grow from his humble E-Rank beginnings.
store.detailed_description:
Deluxe Edition and Preorder Reward

Solo Leveling:ARISE OVERDRIVE

[Deluxe Edition Special Benefits]

1) Game Edition

- Solo Leveling:ARISE OVERDRIVE

2) Deluxe Edition-exclusive Sung Jinwoo costume

- Sung Jinwoo: Overdrive

3) 1 Face Accessory for Sung Jinwoo

4) 2 New Hairstyles for Sung Jinwoo

5) Cha Hae-In Emoji Set (8 total)

- "Hello!", "Let's go!", "You're the best!", "I'm sorry!", "Thanks!", "Help!", "Run!", "Over here!"

6) Yaruru 'Predator Tank'

*A Yaruru is a cute ally character that helps hunters by picking up items and gathering resources for them.

7) 1 New Profile Card

8) 1 New Profile Frame

9) 1 New Icon

10) 1 New Profile Background

The items above may be available separately at a later time.


About the Game

[The Beloved Story Retold with Brand-new Chapters]

Join Sung Jinwoo on his journey to become the world's strongest hunter!

Dive into both the original story from the webtoon and new adventures exclusive to the game!

[Elevated Action]

Experience dynamic, gorgeously animated combat that evolves with your choice of weapons and skill combos!

Dodge monster attacks with Extreme Evasion and land a powerful counterattack with the perfect parry.

Build your own unique combat style through a skill tree that branches into 8 different job advancements!

[Sung Jinwoo, the Monarch of Shadows]

Overwhelm the battlefield with abilities unlocked through your Monarch's Awakening.

Experience Sung Jinwoo's transformation into the [Ultimate Monarch of Shadows],

succeeding Ashborn and growing through a Monarch Awakening system that adapts to every combat situation.

[4-Player Co-op Raids]

Defeat the mighty Commanders in co-op raids.

Choose between fighting as Jinwoo or as a party of other hunters and take them out!

[A Robust Weapon Crafting System]

Defeat monsters in the field and use the various items you obtain from them to craft weapons!

Make and use powerful weapons from the original webtoon like Kasaka's Venom Fang and the Demon King's Daggers!

news.title: Patch Notice
news.author: OVERDRIVE
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team.We have reviewed the feedback provided by Hunters across various channels and have released the following improvements and fixes accordingly.\• Rewards and Items- Increased the amount of Hunt Coins earned from Chapter 1-10 Gates and Dungeon Breaks across all difficulties- Added weapons to the Exchange Shop item list• Battle and Hunters - Modified to allow targeting of off-screen targets even when not locked on during battles - Added an option where the Lock-On target is fixed at the center of the screen - Improved the Lock-On Camera to automatically select the nearest enemy instead of a random enemy as the next target when the current locked-on target is defeated• UI and Miscellaneous - Improved text readability in certain languages - Improved the position and size of certain UI elements - Improved screen resolution when playing certain content - Improved certain Sung Jinwoo and Hunter skin illustrations - Improved the reso...

news.title: Dev Note
news.author: OVERDRIVE
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Gwanghun Kim, the executive producer of ‘Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.’We would like to thank everyone for the incredible support for our game since the official launch and for continuing to share honest feedback with us on areas that need improvement.Your valuable feedback serves as the guide for our development team, and we're doing our best to create a more enjoyable and stable gaming environment based on all the suggestions you send us.We would like to share the key improvements our team is actively working on, based on your suggestions.Key Improvements and Action Plans1. Providing More Ways to Use Different Weapons and Reducing Repetitive FarmingWe’ve heard your feedback that even if you want to try out various weapons, your choices are limited due to the burden of having to level up a new weapon from the start while already having leveled-up ones. We understand how this can make experimenting with different strategies more difficult.Thus, we would lik...

news.title: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Demo Discontinuation Notice
news.author: OVERDRIVE
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team.We would like to express our deepest gratitude for the incredible support of Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.With the official launch of Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE, we plan to discontinue the demo version on 2025 11/27 06:00 (UTC) as we shift our efforts toward delivering improvements for a better gameplay experience.Thank you once again, Hunters. We look forward to continuing this journey with you in Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.

news.title: Login Issue Notice(Resolved on 11/26 (Wed) 19:14 (UTC))
news.author: OVERDRIVE
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team.The connection instability issue has been resolved as of 19:14 (UTC).Currently, you can play Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE normally. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and will do our best to provide a pleasant gaming environment.Thank you.Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team. It has come to our attention that some Hunters are experiencing difficulties logging into the game, and we are currently investigating the cause of the issue.We are promptly investigating the cause of the issue. Once the issue is resolved, we will notify you through this notice.We will do our best to verify and stabilize the issue as quickly as possible. Thank you.

news.title: Patch Notice
news.author: seungaji
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team.A patch has been applied to the game for a better gameplay experience.- Fixed an issue where rewards could not be obtained when participating in Gate Dispatch more than a certain number of times* To apply the patch, please completely close the game and restart it.Thank you.

news.title: Dev Note
news.author: seungaji
news.contents: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Official Release - Offline Mode and Key Improvements AheadGreetings, Hunters.This is Gwanghun Kim, the executive producer of ‘Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.’We sincerely appreciate the passionate support and valuable feedback we’ve received since the release of Advanced Access.Our entire development team has been carefully reading and going through all the comments, reviews, and discussions with close attention. We are greatly encouraged by the positive feedback you’ve shared. At the same time, we feel a deep sense of responsibility for the honest concerns raised regarding aspects we hadn't anticipated or where we fell short.Our commitment is simple: the feedback you share should lead to meaningful improvements you can truly feel in the game.With that, we’d like to walk you through several key areas the team is currently prioritizing and actively working to improve.Key Improvements and Action Plans1. Resolving Always-Online Connection Issues and improvin...

news.title: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Official Release Notice
news.author: seungaji
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team. After a long wait, the Monarch of Shadows' descent has finally begun.Now it is time for Hunters to become Sung Jinwoo and command the Army of Shadows."Arise." The official service for Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is now live! Please check the details below for a smooth registration with the Hunters Association.📌 Schedule- Released on 11/24 (Mon) 17:00 (UTC)📌 Notes - Please make sure to apply the latest platform patch before playing for a smooth experience.- Game data from the demo version will not carry over to the official service.We sincerely thank all Hunters who have patiently awaited the Monarch of Shadows' arrival, and we hope you enjoy your gameplay.We will be cheering for and looking forward to Hunters’ great first steps.

news.title: Patch Notice
news.author: OVERDRIVE
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team.We have reviewed the feedback provided by Hunters across various channels and have released the following improvements and fixes accordingly.\- Improved Pet item collection range and speed- Improved Lock-On Camera when using a gamepad- Improved the Lock-On Camera in certain stages in Chapter 5- Modified to prevent the playtime notification from being displayed on the screen after logging into the game\• Battle and Hunters- Fixed an issue where the Synchro Chain gauge would not recover when the QTE Skill was used during the Basic Skill- Fixed an issue where the Overdrive Skill could not be used when the Synchro Chain Skill is used during the Overdrive Skill- Fixed an issue where battle was occasionally impossible in Workshop of Brilliant Light Vulcan- Fixed an issue where, if Baek Yoonho died while transformed in Hunter mode, Hunter revival would become available after 20 seconds- Fixed an issue where Baek Yoonho would not t...

news.title: Patch Notice
news.author: mcn1ne
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters. This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team.Improvements have been made regarding the issue below.- Co-Op Play mode access instabilityThank you.

news.title: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Twitch Drops Notice
news.author: rururara
news.contents: Greetings, Hunters. Be the Shadow Monarch.This is Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE team. Along with the start of the Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE advanced access,Twitch Drops are live now!We encourage everyone to join, as you can earn various rewards just by watching streams!Some of your favorite influencers including Shroud, Squeex, DisguisedToast, Lilaggy, DansGaming,Summit1G and more will be streaming during the Twitch Drops campaign period so be sure to watch and earn your drops!  📌 Schedule- 11/21 (Fri) 17:00 - 12/20 (Sat) 17:00 (UTC) 📌 Details - Watch streams in the ‘Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE’ category on Twitch to claim your rewards!  👉Link your Twitch account * Please visit the site and link it to your Steam account. 📌 Notes - The Twitch Drops rewards will be delivered to your mailbox and stored for 30 days. Please claim them before the mail expires.  Thank you.
